short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark all IP Board forums as read

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mark all forums as read on IP Boards with a single click.

- Button is always in view - no more scrolling to the bottom of the page
- Just one click - no need to popup the menu and select the "Mark all as read" option

Works with version 3 of IP Board forums.
